rooms.description: Large entrance hall with sliding doors leading into the courtyard and living spaces, designed for wheelchair accessibility
Spacious living room adjacent to courtyard for natural light and ventilation, wheelchair accessible
Open dining space adjoining the living area with easy access
Modern kitchen design with accessible countertops and ample storage, ensuring ease of movement
Well-lit library space located near the entrance for easy access, with adjustable shelving
Accessible bathroom designed with grab rails and slip-resistant floors
